remarks: A permutation of a finite set fixing one element is generated by transpositions not involving the fixed element.  (Contributed by AV, 13-Jan-2019.)
statement:
psgnfix.p $e |- P = ( Base ` ( SymGrp ` N ) ) $.
psgnfix.t $e |- T = ran ( pmTrsp ` ( N \ { K } ) ) $.
psgnfix.s $e |- S = ( SymGrp ` ( N \ { K } ) ) $.
psgnfix1 $p |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ K e. N ) -> ( Q e. { q e. P | ( q ` K ) = K } -> E. w e. Word T ( Q |` ( N \ { K } ) ) = ( S gsum w ) ) ) $.
